Blog About Quotes
December 31, 2013

Apps I Used in 2013

Following MG’s post on the same subject. Thought it was interesting.

Here are mine. Tried to rank in terms of usage/importance per category.

Work

Gmail
Asana
Tempo/Google Calendar
Google Drive
Dropbox
Hipchat
GoToMeeting
Jira
Zendesk
Github
Google Analytics
Balsamiq

Personal

Sleep Time/Clock
Google Maps
Pocket
Evernote
Speedtest
Draft
Lift
Penzu
Line
Yelp
IFTTT
Flixter (Rottentomates)
Yahoo Sports (Fantasy Basketball)
Square Cash

Social

Twitter
Linkedin
Instagram
Buffer
Tumblr

Media

Pandora
Shazam
Netflix

May need to update Tools. Happy New Year!
